Articles.Content: How could I ever have missed this mod before? Instant install.

+bump+

just bumpin a good mod...
Great mod :-) All the B9 parts unlocked in one click, you saved me at least 10min of a really frustrating activity. Thanks.

Thanks, although I might redo my whole career, should be much simpler now with mods and knowing how to get all the science quickly.

Priceless addon for anyone adding parts while a career is already started, there are so many things Squad should have implemented honestly, yet are hacked and added via mods so the game is playable.

I'm not sure that this is working for 0.25.

@sarbian

maybe you could... you know, take a look?

This plugin does work in 0.25.

If you are on Moderate or Hard difficulty, or Custom with the part research unlock costs setting active, researching them all via this mod will deduct the Funds to buy the parts.
I ll work on it soon, but tonight was busy.
And fixed for 0.25

And fixed for 0.25

Nice!! thx sarbian

And fixed for 0.25

Many thanks to you.

Looks like Squad now added this functionality in stock - if you disable entry costs, parts will unlock automatically, without even visiting science lab. I've noticed that on my old career save, when I went to unlock SP+ parts and saw them already unlocked. Then I've saved and installed Station Parts mod - same story.

Looks like Squad now added this functionality in stock - if you disable entry costs, parts will unlock automatically, without even visiting science lab. I've noticed that on my old career save, when I went to unlock SP+ parts and saw them already unlocked. Then I've saved and installed Station Parts mod - same story.

This is true. And with the entry costs, the "purchase all" button is already there. So I think this mod is obsolete in 0.25 even though it is one of most useful mods for < 0.25.
I had similar doubt on the utility when upgrading it. But if some find it better ....

This is true. And with the entry costs, the "purchase all" button is already there. So I think this mod is obsolete in 0.25 even though it is one of most useful mods for < 0.25.

Where is the 0.25 equivalent of this mod? I do not see a native 0.25 "purchase all" option? I use this mod for when I add an addon and all of a sudden I have a bunch of parts available in older nodes of the tree and then I have to go back and pick them all one at a time (WHICH SUCKS!).

Where is the 0.25 equivalent of this mod? I do not see a native 0.25 "purchase all" option? I use this mod for when I add an addon and all of a sudden I have a bunch of parts available in older nodes of the tree and then I have to go back and pick them all one at a time (WHICH SUCKS!).

Are you playing with Entry Costs enabled? If so, there should be a button to purchase all items in a node.

Are you playing with Entry Costs disabled? So am I. And all new mods that add parts to already-unlocked tech get auto-purchased.

Not sure how you're having trouble with this.
Does this mod add a GUI or button(s) somewhere?....I cant find anything to enable/disable Entry Costs?
This mod does nothing with entry cost. It only let you activate/buy all available part in one click. The button shows up when you enter the R&D screen with available parts.
Does this still work with 0.90?

Does this still work with 0.90?

I don't think it's required anymore. I did some progress on the tech tree, then one day I found a nice parts mod and installed it. I was expecting that I needed to unlock them one by one on the tech tree but the new parts were all already researched.

Does it work with 1.0.3?

edit: tested, not working. dialog not show up:(

Edited May 5, 2015 by protonv
Is there a need for it ? It was already not needed anymore in .90 .

Is there a need for it ? It was already not needed anymore in .90 .

Stupid question. But why it not need anymore in 0.90. I still have to click a lot button to unlock entire tech tree
The tree or the parts ? This plugins unlocked the parts when you added a new mod. As far as I know the game does that now.

The tree or the parts ? This plugins unlocked the parts when you added a new mod. As far as I know the game does that now.

oh, sorry my bad. I'm using this mod since 0.25 with save game already unlock all stock part. I just start a new game in 1.0 and thought this mod will unlock all part in tech tree with one click )

Does it work with 1.0.3?

edit: tested, not working. dialog not show up:(

What, already on 1.0.3?

And agree, is no need for it any more. KSP stock already do it.

Edited May 5, 2015 by Climberfx
